name: Withholding Tax Upload
query:
SELECT company AS COMPANY_CODE,
REPLACE(tin, ' ', '') AS WITHHOLDER_TIN,
REPLACE(pi.tax_id, '-', '') AS WITHHOLDEE_TIN,
supplier AS WITHHOLDEE_NAME,
posting_date AS DATE_OF_DEDUCTION,
bill_no AS INVOICE_NUMBER,
'11122111' AS GFS_CODE,
description AS DESCRIPTION,
'TZS' AS CURRENCY,
base_net_amount AS GROSS,
withholding_tax_rate AS RATE,
base_net_amount * withholding_tax_rate / 100 AS TAX_WITHHELD
FROM `tabPurchase Invoice` pi INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pit ON pi.name = pit.parent
   INNER JOIN `tabCompany` c ON pi.company = c.name
WHERE pi.docstatus = 1 AND pit.withholding_tax_rate != 0
